# Class LLMPromptBuilderNode

LLM prompt builder node that processes JSON input into formatted prompts. This node transforms structured JSON data into text prompts that can be used directly with LLM completion endpoints.

#### Input

[JsonData](./common_data_types_external_json_data.JsonData) \- The data type that LLMPromptBuilderNode accepts as input

#### Output

[TextData](./common_data_types_external_text_data.TextData) \- The data type that LLMPromptBuilderNode accepts as output

#### Example


```
const promptBuilderNode = new LLMPromptBuilderNode(&#123;  id: 'prompt-builder',  messages: [    &#123; role: 'system', content: 'You are a helpful assistant.' &#125;,    &#123; role: 'user', content: '&#123;&#123;user_question&#125;&#125;' &#125;  ],  responseFormat: 'text'&#125;);

```
